message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7500. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6800. Can you meet me at that price?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not comfortable going as low as $6800. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $7200. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $6900. Can you meet me at that price?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer you the product for $7100. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $6800. Can you meet me at that price?
